CoinFlip: %s has flipped a coin for %s. The result is %s.
CoinFlipRecently: A coin was flipped too recently, please wait %d seconds.
PauseResumeWarningMessage: Game will automatically resume in %d seconds.
PauseNoTeamReadyMessage: No team is ready to resume, type unpause in console to ready for your team.
PauseTooManyPausesMessage: Your team is out of pauses.
TournamentModeTeamReadyAlert: %s are ready, waiting on %s to start game.
TournamentModeReadyAlert: Both teams need to ready for the game to start.
TournamentModeForfeitWarning: %s have %d %s left to ready before forfeiting.
TournamentModeGameForfeited: %s have forfeit the round due to not reading within %s seconds.
TournamentModeReadyNoComm: Your team needs a commander to ready.
UnstuckCancelled: You moved or were unable to be unstuck currently.
UnstuckIn: You will be unstuck in %s seconds.
UnstuckRecently: You have unstucked too recently, please wait %d seconds.
MercApprovalNeeded: The opposite team will need to approve you as a merc.
MercApproved: %s has been approved as a merc for %s.
NSL_HEARTBEAT_OVERRIDE: Heartbeat Messages have been disabled for your client.
NSL_HEARTBEAT_WARN: Heartbeat Messages not recieved by server in the last %s seconds.  Type heartbeat in console if you are still connected, otherwise you will be disconnected!
NSL_HEARTBEAT_CRITICAL: Heartbeat Messages not recieved by server in the last %s seconds.  Type heartbeat in console if you are still connected, otherwise you will be disconnected in %s seconds!
MERCSHELP_1: %sChat command, will clear any merc approvals for your team.
MERCSHELP_2: %sChat or console command, will also clear any merc approvals for your team.
MERCSHELP_3: %sChat command, will approve opposing teams merc(s).
MERCSHELP_4: %sChat or console command, will approve opposing teams merc(s).
MERCSHELP_5: %sChat command, will approve opposing teams merc(s).
MERCSHELP_6: NOTE!: Approving a merc optionally accepts details to identify the target player.
MERCSHELP_7: NOTE!: Mercs can be approved based on name, ns2id or game ID, all of which are listed in sv_nslinfo.
NSL_MANUAL_REPLACE_PLAYER_ERROR: Something went wrong when caching the player :(.
NSL_SPAWNS_INVALID_UPDATE: Invalid usage. Usage: <marine spawn location>, <alien spawn location>
NSL_SPAWNS_UPDATED: Setting spawns to %s for marines and %s for aliens.
NSL_TEAM_CHOOSE_SPAWN: Your team has selected %s as your spawn.
NSL_TEAM_CHOOSE_RANDOM_SPAWN: Your team has selected a random spawn.
NSL_PERF_CONFIGS_ALLOWED: NSL Plugin now allowing access to set performance configs.
NSL_PERF_CONFIGS_DISALLOWED: NSL Plugin now dis-allowing access to set performance configs.
NSL_LEAGUE_ADMIN_ACCESS_ALLOWED: NSL Plugin now allowing access to server admin commands.
NSL_LEAGUE_ADMIN_ACCESS_DISALLOWED: NSL Plugin now dis-allowing access to server admin commands.
NSL_PERF_CONFIG_CURRENT: NSL Plugin currently using %s performance config.
NSL_PERF_CONFIG_UPDATED: NSL Plugin now using %s performance config.
NSL_LEAGUE_CONFIG_CURRENT: NSL Plugin currently using %s league config.
NSL_LEAGUE_CONFIG_UPDATED: NSL Plugin now using %s league config.
NSL_MODE_UPDATED_SEASONS_NOTE: NOTE: For seasonal content to work as expected, map has to be reloaded.
NSL_MODE_UPDATED: NSL Plugin now running in %s config.
NSL_MODE_CURRENT: NSL Plugin currently running in %s config.
SV_NSLCFG: %s<state> - disabled,gather,pcw,official - Changes the configuration mode of the NSL plugin.
SV_NSLCONFIG: %s<league> - Changes the league settings used by the NSL plugin.
SV_NSLLEAGUEADMINS: Toggles league staff having access to administrative commands on server.
SV_NSLLEAGUEPERACCESS: Toggles league staff having access set performance configs.
SV_NSLPERFCONFIG: %s<config> - Changes the performance config used by the NSL plugin.
SV_NSLPASSWORD: %s<password> - Sets the current password on the server.
CMD_COINFLIP: coinflip: Simulates a coinflip and returns heads or tails.
SV_NSLSETTEAMSPAWNS: %smarinespawnname, alienspawnname, Spawns teams at specified locations. Locations must be exact
SV_NSLFIRSTPERSONSPECTATE: %sMoves you into first person spectate for the player you are currently spectating.
SV_NSLHANDICAP: %s<0.1 - 1> Lowers your damage to the specified percentage.
CMD_HEARTBEAT: %sDisables heartbeat requirement for your client.  Only use if having connection problems!
CMD_UNPAUSE: %sReadies your team to resume the game.
SV_NSLHELP: %sReturns various NSL commands and their helper messages.
SV_NSLPAUSE: %sWill pause/unpause game using standard delays.  Does not consume teams allowed pauses.
SV_NSLSETPAUSES: %s<team, pauses> - Sets the number of pauses remaining for a team.
SV_NSLINFO: %s<team> - marines,aliens,specs,other,all - Will return the player details from the corresponding league site.
SV_NSLSAY: %s<message> - Will send a message to all connected players that displays in yellow.
SV_NSLTSAY: %s<team, message> - Will send a message to all players on the team provided that displays in yellow.
SV_NSLPSAY: %s<player, message> - Will send a message to the provided player that displays in yellow.
SV_NSLFUNCTIONDATA: %s<player> - Will display logged client side hooks for the provided player.
SV_NSLREPLACEPLAYER: %s<newPlayer, oldPlayer> Will force different player to take crashed/disconnect players place.
SV_NSLLISTCACHEDPLAYERS: %sWill list currently cached players names and steamIDs, for sv_nslreplaceplayer cmd.
SV_NSLSETTEAMNAMES: %s<team1name, team2name> Will set the team names manually, also will prevent automatic team name updates.
SV_NSLSWITCHTEAMS: %sWill switch team names (best used if setting team names manually).
SV_NSLSETTEAMSCORES: %s<t1score, t2score> Will set the team scores manually.
SV_NSLSETTEAMIDS: %s<t1id, t2id> Will set the team ids manually.
SV_NSLAPPROVEMERCS: %s<team, opt. player> - Forces approval of teams mercs, '1' approving for marines which allows alien mercs.
SV_NSLCLEARMERCS: %s<team> - 1,2 - Clears approval of teams mercs, '1' clearing any alien mercs.
SV_NSLMERCHELP: %sDisplays specific help information pertaining to approving and clearing mercs.
SV_NSLFORCESTART: %s<seconds> - Will force the game start countdown to start in the provided amount of seconds, or 15 if blank.
SV_NSLCANCELSTART: %sWill cancel a game start countdown currently in progress.
CMD_READY: %sMarks your team as ready to begin the game.
CMD_NOTREADY: %sMarks your team as not ready to begin the game.
CMD_UNSTUCK: %sWill automatically attempt to unstuck you after a few seconds.
NSL_PLAYER_INFO_HEADING: IGN = In-Game Name, sID = SteamID, gID = GameID, HCap = Handicap, LNick = League Nickname, LTeam = League Team, LID = League ID
NSL_PLAYER_INFO_MESSAGE: IGN : %s, sID : %s, NS2ID : %s, gID : %s, HCap : %.0f%%, LNick : %s, LTeam : %s, LID : %s
NSL_PLAYER_INFO_MESSAGE_INVALID: IGN : %s, sID : %s, NS2ID : %s, gID : %s, HCap : %.0f%%, League Information Unavailable or Unregistered User.
NSL_FUNCTION_DATA_HEADING: Function data listed below, broken down per player.  Includes player info details.
SV_NSLCAPTAINSLIMIT: %s<limit> Changes the player limit for each team in Captains mode.
NSL_CAPTAINS_LIMIT_UPDATED: Captains player limit updated to %s players per team.
NSL_CAPTAINS_LIMIT_CURRENT: Captains player limit currently set to %s players per team.
CMD_JOINGAME: %sWill register you for the upcoming captains game.
CMD_LEAVEGAME: %sWill remove you from the upcoming captains game.
NSL_CAPTAINS_PLAYER_REGISTERED: %s has joined the next game, %s player slots remaining!
NSL_CAPTAINS_TOO_MANY_PLAYERS_REGISTERED: Unable to join, too many players already are registered!
NSL_CAPTAINS_VOTING_STARTED: Voting for team captains has started!  Use votecaptain in chat or console to vote
NSL_CAPTAINS_VOTED_FOR_CAPTAIN: Voted for %s to be a captain.  You have %s votes remaining.
NSL_CAPTAINS_SELECTION: Captains %s and %s have been selected!  They will now begin picking teams.
CMD_VOTECAPTAIN: %s<player> - Will vote for the specified player to be a captain.  2 votes allowed per player.
CMD_SELECTPLAYER: %s<player> - (Captains Only!) Will select the specified player to join your team.
NSL_CAPTAINS_SELECTED: You have been selected as a Captain!  You can use selectplayer in chat or console to pick your players when it is your turn to pick.
NSL_CAPTAIN_SWITCH_CAPTAIN_SELECTION: You now can select %s players!  Use selectplayer in chat or console to select the player
CMD_SELECTMAP: %s<map> - Will vote for the specified map.
NSL_CAPTAIN_VOTED_FOR_MAP_CHANGED: %s has changed their map vote from %s to %s
NSL_CAPTAINS_MODE_WELCOME_REGISTER: This server is running in Captains Mode!  To join the game, type joingame in chat or console during the registration phase.
NSL_CAPTAINS_MODE_WELCOME_INPROGRESS: This server is running in Captains Mode!  A game is currently in progress.  Once it has ended, you can register for the next game using joingame in chat or console.
NSL_CAPTAINS_ALREADY_REGISTERED: You have already registered for the next game!
NSL_CAPTAINS_MODE_REGISTRATION_PERIODIC: This server is running in Captains Mode, currently in the registration phase.  %s player(s) out of %s have registered for the next game!
NSL_CAPTAINS_MODE_VOTING_PERIODIC_WITHVO: %s seconds left to pick Captains.  You have %s vote(s) left.
NSL_CAPTAIN_ALL_PLAYERS_SELECTED: Teams have been picked, game will start once both teams ready!
NSL_CAPTAINS_MAP_VOTE_COMPLETED: %s won the vote, cycling in %s seconds.
NSL_CAPTAINS_MAP_VOTE_STARTED: Map vote has started, will end in %s seconds.
NSL_CAPTAINS_MAP_VOTE_PERIODIC: Map vote has %s seconds remaining, currently %s is winning.
NSL_OPPONENT_MUTE_TOGGLE: %sThis will hide the opposing teams chat messages if enabled.
